title: Broken Ranked Queue
body:
I recently came back to league of legends after a rather extended break. Upon my return i completed my 10 ranked placement matches, that went something like this:

3w - 7L

however, my games became increasingly difficult and after checking some profiles i realised i was being put against and with plat players consistently. i was then placed in silver 2. my first silver 2 game i was in a game full of plats and gold 3-1....

how after being placed in silver 2 is my ELO still at gold/plat? please explain.
